text: As the list of hubl filters grows, it would be nice to have the filters grouped by category in <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/filters|the filters docs>. For example: blog filters, math filters, array filters, etc
I think it's based on the version your using.
V4 has different reference than v5 or 6
